pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, June 1, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the flag raising ceremony on Parliament Hill for Pride Month. Minister of Tourism and Associate Minister of Finance Randy Boissonnault, Minister of Sport and Minister responsible for the Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec Pascale St-Onge, and Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Youth Marci Ien will also be in attendance.

West Lawn
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
